ProductInfo.Features:
Dual SIM Card Dual Standby. Support 2G: GSM 850/900/1800/1900MHz; 3G: WCDMA 850/2100MHz. Android 4.2 operating system, better reliability and compatibility. MTK6589T Cortex A7 Quad Core 1.5GHz CPU, excellent processing platform.
5-inch IPS OGS 5-point touch capacitive touchscreen with high resolution of FHD 1920 * 1080 pixels. 8.0 mega-pixel front camera and 13 mega-pixel auto focus rear camera with flashlight.
1GB RAM, 16GB ROM and support micro SD card / TF card expansion up to 64GB. High capacity 2100mAh polymer lithium ion battery, long standby time. Support Bluetooth 3.0, GPS, 802.11 b/g/n WiFi, G-sensor, etc.Other Features	3G, WIFI, GPS, FM, Bluetooth, Ebook, Email, Messaging, Wallpapers, Calendar, Calculator, Clock, Camera, Play Store, Compass, etc.
Language	Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Danish, German, English, Spanish, Filipino, French, Croatian, Italian, Hungarian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Roman, Finnish, Swedish language, Vietnamese, Turkish, Greek, Russian, Hebrew, Arabic, Hindi, Thai, Korean
Product Size	Approx. 14 * 7.1 * 0.9cm / 6.51 * 2.79 * 0.35in Product Weight	Approx. 148g / 5.22in Package Size	Approx. 16 * 9 * 6cm / 6.3 * 3.54 * 2.36in Package Weight	Approx. 380g / 13.4oz
ProductInfo.Name: CUBOT T9 Android 3G Smartphone 5" FHD 1080P IPS OGS MTK6589T Cortex A7 Quad Core 1.5GHz 8MP/13MP 1GB+16GB Gyroscope Sensor Bluetooth GPS (White)
